data.Name: Drew Glazier
data.staff_bio:
B.A., Bard College

Drew Glazier provides administrative support for several projects and teams at the Institute for Community Inclusion, primarily the Events Coordinator and the Training & Technical Assistance staff, coordination of registration for online and in-person training, invoicing and payment processing, production of printed materials for conferences, training and other events, and course administration and technical support for ICI's online workshops and training.  Drew has more recently provided support to the Instructional Technology staff, captioning and transcribing videos for conferences and training.
